title: Looking for suggestions for kayle build
body:
So my current core build 
Sated
Bork
Runans
Beserkers


Statik
Ie


Ie  usualy situatipon i often get merc sword or bt or yumus

Main things i want to look at are should i get phantom over statik
And what would be good for the damage item 
Though im happy to take any suggestions 
Also ive seen wits end which seems good on paper for kayle

replies.body:
Kayle build is usually:
Devo
CDR Boots(for perma e)
Bork(devo+bork=love)
Deathcap(ap kayle is stronger then ad)
Rylai's(who doesn't love perma slows)
Runaan's, Ludens, Rage blade.(pretty much anything you want here)
I know ap is stronger i just like going machine gun

>
> I know ap is stronger i just like going machine gun

Dun build statik shiv on kayle get a wits end or something else

^ yep shiv is for wave clear
